overview: XALT (XALT: Cross-Platform Application Launching Tool) is a software tool designed to track job and process information on High-Performance Computing (HPC) systems. It captures and logs job-specific metadata such as software usage, compiler options, resource consumption, and job dependencies to facilitate performance analysis and optimization.
core_features: Tracking and logging job-specific metadata on HPC systems
Monitoring software usage, compiler options, and resource utilization
Capturing job dependencies and software versions for reproducibility
Analyzing application performance and resource consumption
